description: A container representing a single tab of a TabFolder widget.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

parent.description: Returns the `TabFolder` the `Tab` is hosted in or `null` if it has no parent.

appendTo.description: Appends this widget to the given `TabFolder` instance.

insertBefore.description: Inserts this widget directly before the given `Tab`.

insertAfter.description: Inserts this widget directly after the given `Tab`.

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: A selector expression or a predicate function to filter the results.

siblings.description: Returns a (possibly empty) collection of all siblings of this widget that match the given selector.

title.description: The title to be displayed on the tab.

image.description: An image to be displayed on the tab.  Will not be shown on iOS if the `TabFolder`'s `tabBarLocation` is set to `top`

selectedImage.description: An image to be displayed on the currently active tab.

badge.description: A badge to attach on the tab. The property only has an effect when the parent `TabFolder` has its `tabBarLocation` set to `bottom`. Setting the `badge` to `0` hides the badge. The background color of the badge can be controlled with the `badgeColor` property.

badgeColor.description: The background color used for the `badge` indicator.

appear.description: Fired when the tab will become visible, i.e. the selection of its TabFolder.

disappear.description: Fired when the tab is no longer visible, i.e. it no longer is the selection of its TabFolder.
